== Main Inclusion Report for edsadmin ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/e/edsadmin, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Dependency of the upcoming edubuntu network auth server
** Used as LDAP replacement for the gnome user and groups tool.
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=edsadmin|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=edsadmin|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions higher than priority 'medium'.
** No debian package yet
** Active <nowiki>[[http://edsadmin.sourceforge.net/|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=123562&atid=697001|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
